item.title: Revolucionando la administración tributaria: el poder de la digitalización para alcanzar los pilares de la OCDE y los objetivos BEPS
item.description:
In an era of rapid technological advancement, tax administrations worldwide are embracing innovative solutions to enhance efficiency, improve compliance, and combat fraud. Two groundbreaking technologies at the forefront of this revolution are Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Blockchain. This blog explores their proven applications in tax administration and highlights best practices for implementation.

Artificial Intelligence in Tax Administration

Artificial Intelligence has emerged as a game-changer in the field of tax administration, offering unprecedented capabilities in data analysis, fraud detection, and taxpayer services. Let’s delve into some real and proven uses of AI in tax administration across the globe.
